description.narrative: This activity (Business Integrity Initiative) is a component of International Action Against Corruption reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £498,653. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Anti-corruption organisations and institutions. , with the following implementing partners: Basel Institute on Governance, British Business Association of Kenya, Ethical Trading Initiative, Shift. The start date is 26-07-2017 and the end date is 31-03-2021.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
